name: Etemon
effect: ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)[On Deletion] Reveal 5 cards from the top of your deck. You may play 1 level 6 Digimon card with [Etemon] in its name among them without paying its memory cost. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
